definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: He suggested that tangling fishing gear should be made a criminal offence.
sentences.chinese: 他提議，纏繞捕魚器材應該算刑事犯罪。

sentences.english: The motion that the remark of the last speaker be expunged from the record.
sentences.chinese: 該提議要求把最後一個發言的人的講話從記錄上除掉。

sentences.english: The motion that the remark of the last speaker (should) be expunged from the record.
sentences.chinese: 該提議要求把最後一個發言的人的講話從記錄上除掉。
塔爾坎對這一提議不以爲然。

sentences.english: It is proposed that the occasion should be marked by a dinner.
sentences.chinese: 有人提議應該設宴慶祝這個重大活動。

sentences.english: Do the project proposals in the pipeline correspond with market trends?
sentences.chinese: 正在進行中的項目提議是否符合市場趨勢？

sentences.english: Some local businessmen proposed to raise a comfort fund for the earthquake victims.
sentences.chinese: 當地一些商人提議向地震受害者籌集撫卹金。

sentences.english: he was skilful at sketching. Suddenly, Abe suggested to go skiing.
sentences.chinese: 他素描畫得很嫺熟，突然，艾貝提議去滑雪。

sentences.english: But in this area, it seems that no good idea goes unpunished.
sentences.chinese: 但是在這個地區，好提議卻往往得不到認同。

sentences.english: I proposed Mr. Hunter for the job .
sentences.chinese: 我提議漢特先生來幹這工作。

sentences.english: I proposed that we should all go and eat ices in the park.
sentences.chinese: 我們都又熱又累，我提議一起到公園去喫一點冷食。

sentences.english: The new advisory covers several towns northeast of the mandatory exclusion zone.
sentences.chinese: 新提議的疏散區包括了強制隔離區東北的幾個城鎮。

sentences.english: I deliberated whether or not to accept her offer.
sentences.chinese: 我仔細考慮了是否接受她的提議。

sentences.english: We made good proposals to Taye but he refused.
sentences.chinese: 我們作了份了不錯的提議給塔耶，但是他拒絕了。

sentences.english: CARICOM countries made this high-level event happen.
sentences.chinese: 這次高級別會議是在加勒比共同體國家提議下舉行的。

definition: to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to persuade/to convince/to talk sb over/Taiwan pr. [shui4 fu2]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
